name: name
password_validation_messages: password must be at least 8 characters and must contain at least one uppercase , one lowercase letter and at least one digit
username_validation_messages: username must be at least 8 characters and must contain only letters, digits and/or underscore

errors.min_length: The %{field} field must be at least %{min} characters long
errors.max_length: The %{field} field must not exceed %{max} characters long
errors.invalid_name: Name must contain some letters and/or space(s)
errors.invalid_username: Username must contain only letters, digits or underscoore
errors.invalid_password: Password must contain only letters, digits and at least one capital , one small charactar and at least one digit
errors.email_exists: This email is already in use
errors.invalid_credentials: These credentials do not match ours
